sentence.Network_en: Harrods will also engrave your child's name on the side.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈罗兹还会将你孩子的名字刻在侧面。

sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to engrave in marble.
sentence.Network_cn: 在大理石上雕刻是困难的.

sentence.Network_en: He has heard the words and they engrave a memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过话他还是听在耳里,留在记忆之中了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (formerly also as ingrave): from en-, in- 'in, on' + grave, influenced by obsolete French engraver

entry.def: If you engrave something with a design or words, or if you engrave a design or words on it, you cut the design or words into its surface.

example.ex: Your wedding ring can be engraved with a personal inscription at no extra cost...
example.tran: 可以免费在你的婚戒上刻上你的题字。

example.ex: Harrods will also engrave your child's name on the side...
example.tran: 哈罗兹还会将你孩子的名字刻在侧面。

means.word_mean: 1. carve, cut, or etch into a material or surface;

sentences.sentence: "engraved the winner's name onto the trophy cup"
"The event engraved itself into her memory"

means.word_mean: 3. carve, cut, or etch into a block used for printing or print from such a block;
4. carve, cut, or etch a design or letters into;

sentences.sentence: "engrave the pen with the owner's name"

auth_sentence.content: To engrave spoons and forks with crests and ciphers.
auth_sentence.res_content: To engrave spoons and forks with crests and ciphers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To engrave spoons and forks with crests and ciphers.

auth_sentence.content: We hope to engrave an inestimably precious legacy into the collective memory of watchmaking devotees.
auth_sentence.res_content: We hope to engrave an inestimably precious legacy into the collective memory of watchmaking devotees.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We hope to engrave an inestimably precious legacy into the collective memory of watchmaking devotees.

auth_sentence.content: Men are trained to draw and engrave Chinese characters, which are then set into a type-page and printed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men are trained to draw and engrave Chinese characters, which are then set into a type-page and printed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men are trained to draw and engrave Chinese characters, which are then set into a type-page and printed.

means.word_mean: 在(硬物)上雕刻(字, 画等)

sentences.en: He engraved my name on the silver plate.
sentences.cn: 他在银盘子上刻上我的名字。

means.word_mean: 将某事物深深印在(记忆或头脑中)

sentences.en: This episode remains sharply engraved on my mind.
sentences.cn: 这段经历至今仍深深地铭刻在我的心中。

jushi.english: It is engraved on my memory.
jushi.chinese: 这深深地印在我的脑海中。

jushi.english: He engraved my name on the silver plate.
jushi.chinese: 他在银盘子上刻上我的名字。

jushi.english: His dying words were engraved in her mind.
jushi.chinese: 她将他的临终遗言铭记在心。
